dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6227 IH: Adding Coccidioidomycosis to the FDA Priority Review Voucher Program Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Schweikert (for himself, Mr. McCarthy, Mr. Burgess, Mr. Self, Mr. Ciscomani, Mr. Armstrong, Mr. Gallego, Ms. Caraveo, Mr. Costa, Mr. Grijalva, Mrs. Steel, Mr. Levin, Ms. De La Cruz, and Mr. Valadao) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to expand the tropical disease product priority review voucher program to encourage prevention and treatment of coccidioidomycosis.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Adding Coccidioidomycosis to the FDA Priority Review Voucher Program Act of 2023.

section.header: Expanding tropical disease product priority review voucher program to encourage prevention and treatment of coccidioidomycosis
section.text: Section 524(a)(3) of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (21 U.S.C. 360n(a)(3)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subparagraph (S) as subparagraph (T); and
by inserting after subparagraph (R) the following:
